name: Shaman Coloring!
description:
Welcome to the Shaman Coloring!


Shaman Coloring is a free adventure puzzle-painting and hidden object game for casual gamers with an unforgettable story!
We encounter you on a different, epic and fantastic adventure. Ancient and Mythologic World and full of adventures and represented by narrators with a meditation speech.
Someone who has lived in the cave for years by sleeping, a guardian angel is protecting her, adventures of the cave and the task of reviving life.
Our Hero, Iskra: Daughter of the first Shaman Guardian of GAO and NOX: her guardian, Cave, Stone hands, and Soul of Flowers.
A long time ago, Life has been betrayed. Earth lost its colour and fell asleep. Now it's time to wake up. Earth must be awakened. Help Iskra to resurrect the Life.
When the Tree of Life was killed by demons, Earth lost its colours, and life fell asleep. Souls appointed as Guardians of Life foresee such a situation, so in the secret cave, Iskra they must have protected her.
When the time comes, Iskra will wake up and set out to revive the Life tree. The goal on her forehead she can take the seed of the Tree of Life to the roots of the Tree of Life and bread and GAO the tree of Life is to give.
Are you ready for this task? Then resurrect the Tree of Life and pass the levels.
This game is relaxing and challenging for you. Shaman Coloring will completely refresh your mental functions vigorously and will rest your body and provide your calmness.
Shaman Coloring has everything you're looking for in an adventure game. Hints, hidden objects, potions, energy renewal, also meditation. All of the ancient and mythologic world.
Adventure sleepscape game. Fantastic, hidden object, puzzle and painting-colouring and adventure game. Listen and follow instructions of the narrators. Keep Calm.
Colour all the hidden objects. Complete the puzzle
Awake Iskra and give potions to help her.
Resurrect the life tree. Give life to the Earth.
Create your Art when Iskra revives her tasks and discovers the new ancient world, rescues earth and re-write history. Not a painting or colouring book, you will create your state of the art with Iskra and show your creativity.
Calm your mind and become mindful. Colour Therapy.
We will take you from a stressful world and take you to a story full of ancient shamanism. That brings you emotional agility and helps you to be resilient.
Features of Shaman Coloring:

• 3D graphics and colourful gameplay.
• Spectacular boosters and bonus rewards unlocked after many levels
• Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
• Hundreds of puzzling levels, update every week!
• Leader boards to watch your friends and competitors!
• Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the Internet
